name: Zombie Outbreak (Kaleb Taylor)
description:
In this game you battle waves of zombies as a military force, constructing a fortified base around all recruits on the battlefield; protecting them from the evasive zombie outbreak! Each wave gets progressively more chaotic as you gain more troops & area to protect them in. Select building option and click to place, repair walls when they take damage, waves of zombies will attack and you must protect your soldiers while gaining resources from zombies killed but watch out, On wave 10 a final zombie attacks. Get ready to fortify and survive.  Let there be chaos!

This game was created by 2 student developers  over the course 5 days. We had a blast participating in the Brackeys 2021 Game Jam & learned a ton!

Devs:

Kaleb Taylor: https://kalebtaylor.itch.io

Roy Thomblison: https://gamejolt.com/@RoyThomblison
